analysis.description:
Bet.withdraw (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#511-520) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- betInfo.dealer.transfer(_balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#512-518)

Reentrancy in Bet.closeBet (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#456-485):
	External calls:
	- (leftPts,rightPts,confirmations) = dataCenterGetResult(betInfo.gameId) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#458-463)
	External calls sending eth:
	- distributeReward(betInfo.leftOdds) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#476-477)
	- distributeReward(betInfo.middleOdds) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#481)
	- distributeReward(betInfo.rightOdds) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#482)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isBetClosed (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#484)
DataCenterBridge.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#68-77) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in DataCenterBridge.dataCenterAPI (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#26-35):
	External calls:
	- address(dataCenter) != DAR.getAddress() (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#29-35)
	- dataCenter = DataCenterInterface(DAR.getAddress()) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#30-35)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- dataCenter (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#30-35)

Bet.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- players[i].transfer(playerInfo[players[i]].betAmount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#506)

Bet.distributeReward has external calls inside a loop:
	- players[i].transfer(winOdds.mul(playerInfo[players[i]].betAmount).div(100)) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#525-526)

Reentrancy in Bet.closeBet (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#456-485):
	External calls:
	- (leftPts,rightPts,confirmations) = dataCenterGetResult(betInfo.gameId) (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#458-463)
	State variables written after the call(s):

DataCenterBridge.getCodeSize uses assembly (/unique_chucks/17/0xf70e44e803e66c40890ac4875e5036fdb55b5e81.sol#68-77)
